name: MatrixCreationDict
doc:
@platform android 0.8 @platform blackberry 3.1.2 @platform iphone 0.8 @platform ipad 0.8 @platform mobileweb 1.8 @pseudo @editurl https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/edit/master/apidoc/Titanium/UI/2DMatrix.yml

Simple object passed to Titanium.UI.create2DMatrix to initialize a matrix.

@description

The matrix is initialized with the specified transforms.

On iOS, rotation is always performed first, regardless of the order the properties are specified in.

On Android, specifying both scale and rotate the same dictionary results in an incorrect transformation.

property.name: anchorPoint
property.doc:
Point to rotate around, specified as a dictionary object with x and y properties, where { x: 0.5, y: 0.5 } represents the center of whatever is being rotated.

@platform android 0.8
property.shortDoc:
Point to rotate around, specified as a dictionary object with x and y
properties, where { x: 0.5, y: 0.5 } represents...

property.name: rotate
property.doc: Rotation angle, in degrees. See the rotate method for a discussion of rotation.

property.name: scale
property.doc: Scale the matrix by the specified scaling factor. The same scaling factor is used for both horizontal and vertical scaling.
property.shortDoc: Scale the matrix by the specified scaling factor. ...
